title: Are there any fictional or literary characters very similar in personality to Jason Bourne and also have a similar life to that of the films? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A. I need to read up more on spy fiction; so far, I’ve only read stuff from Tom Clancy and Ian Fleming (James Bond). But the only spy fiction that I’m more interested in is the thinking man or character-driven stories like John le Carre in his books, even Clancy does the same with Jack Ryan. Spy fiction is full of characters that use their intelligence more so than their hand-to-hand combat. In real life, spies aren’t known for being badass assassins like Bourne. However, spies do think like Bourne in that they’re always trying to be 10 steps ahead of their enemy. The only character that I can think of that is similar to Jason Bourne in fiction is Lee Child’s Jack Reacher. He is a military police investigator, but he knows several martial arts and his personality is no nonsense like Bourne.
